results.aliases: Famicom Wars Nintendo Wars Advance Wars
results.deck: Advance wars is a turn based strategy game that provides simple gameplay mechanics while still being a fun and deep strategy experience
results.description:
Nintendo/Famicom Wars is a turn based strategy game that first appeared on the Famicom. The series would not see a US installment until 2001, when Advance Wars was released on the GBA.Â  The game features a map making tool and has recently included online play in the latest Nintendo DS installment.

In 2005 Battalion Wars a more action oriented offshoot franchise of the classic Nintendo Wars games was released on the Nintendo Gamecube followed by Battalion Wars 2 on the Nintendo Wii in 2007.
results.name: Nintendo Wars

concept.name: Games That Ask You to "Press Start" But Will Accept Other Buttons
